post.body: I'm on Twitter ... you're on Twitter ... and we're both angry! Give me a follow, and help me lead the Twitter Revolution!
account is suspended ... my penis cries salty tears :(
Seeking adventure? Romance? Cheap airfare? I can't do any of that but, if you follow me, I'll entertain ya! lol
Joker and Achmed the Dead Terrorist in one tweet. Damn, you're good! lol If she follows, I'll send her your way!
I "digg" this ... I "digg" that ... I've done more digging than a gravedigger lol Follow me to the promised land!
It's cool, lies ... this is strictly platonic ... I won't mess wit ya girl :)
Followed you since "Singled Out" ... don't you think it's time you returned the favor? LOL jk ... you're awesome, Chris!
You don't know me, but you must follow me. I am your only hope for survival in this digital world. LOL just kidding!
how do you find these coupons, man? I'm a cheapskate and love to save money ... lol
Any riend of @Mia is a friend of mine. You are followed my friend!
What do you need me to do? Whack a guy? Off a guy? Whack of a guy, because I'm straight ... lol *Family Guy*
help me get to 400! You're my pimp ... do your job! lol
I just don't think Forest has found his "vehicle" role yet. He's a great actor, but he continually fails to find that niche.
@warshadow Excellent show, guys! One of the few webshows that don't fail to entertain! Thanks again!
is almost there! Please sign up, and comment, telling them "theMINDofWARD" sent ya!
He doesn't hang out around the Home Depot, because he's here on Twitter! Follow @liesforliars and learn how to love again!
I am obviously on the fail in the typing department tonight ... er, this morning ... er, whatever lol
http://twitter.com/THE_REAL_SHAQ Follow me, Shaq! You won't regret it!
almost to 400 ... get me there, bitchez!
ALMOST TO 400 VISITORS! GET ME THERE! PLEASE RE-TWEET!
